attributes.action: Include the option to vote for none of the above on all general election ballot papers
attributes.additional_details:
More and more people feel that the present 3 party choice offered, along with a collection of misfits and loonies, is no real choice at all.
Low turn outs at elections are now becoming normal due to this lack of choice.
Let those of us who believe we have no viable candidate have this option to register a protest.
